operations.description: Retrieves the list of approved schemas available for Azure Data Transfer. This operation has reached end of life support starting version 2025-05-30-preview. For schema support please create and use a FlowProfile resource.
operations.name: Microsoft.AzureDataTransfer/listApprovedSchemas/action

operations.description: Validates the structure and content of a schema for use in Azure Data Transfer. This operation has reached end of life support starting version 2025-05-30-preview. For schema support please create and use a FlowProfile resource.
operations.name: Microsoft.AzureDataTransfer/validateSchema/action

operations.description: Retrieves the list of FlowProfiles within a Pipeline that is available for Azure Data Transfer.
operations.name: Microsoft.AzureDataTransfer/listFlowProfiles/action
